properties.name: steamtracker.steam.api-key
properties.description: Key for fetching information from Steam API.

properties.name: steamtracker.updater.snapshots-page-size
properties.description: The number of players to fetch from database at once when updating snapshots.

properties.name: steamtracker.updater.snapshots-chunk-size
properties.description: The number of players to process before saving when updating snapshots.

properties.name: steamtracker.front-page.games-in-tables
properties.description: Number of games to show in tables.

properties.name: steamtracker.front-page.fill-tables
properties.description: Create empty table cells where the amount of games is less than gamesInTables.
